crab louse (Pthirus pubis), crab lice, pubic louse, pubic lice
one by one, thoroughly, exhaustively, with a fine-tooth comb
biting louse (any louse of order Mallophaga), chewing louse
body louse (Pediculus humanus humanus), body lice
